sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RHETORIANS, a ſect of heretics in Egypt, ſo denominated from Rhetorius tlieir leader. The diſtinguiſhlng tenets of this hereſiarch, as repreſented by Philaſtrius, was, that he approved of all the hereſies before him, and taught that they were all in the right.
